item.title: Competitive programming with python
item.description: Table Of Contents Why python for competitive programming? Resources for CP with python:- Approach for solving a problem Why python for competitive programming? There are many programming languages with which one can approach to solve CP problems but in this blog we will focus on python and also some reasons why python can be a good choice for programming . During technical interviews recruiters have many questions focusing on core coding concepts such as OOPs, SOLID principles , and also problem solving problems .
